apiTokenDescription: Use for public applications that do not require your users to sign in or for personal scripting apps.
userAuthenticationDescription: Use for applications that require your users to sign in with an ArcGIS account.
appAuthenticationDescription: Use for public applications that do not require your users to sign in and generate access tokens server-side.

learnMoreLabels.learnMoreAPIToken: Learn more about API key authentication

billing.userAuthenticationBilling: Usage ${startLink}billed${endLink} to the ${startStrong}signed in user's${endStrong} ArcGIS subscription

billingLabels.userAuthenticationBillingLabel: Billing for user authentication. Usage billed to the signed in user's ArcGIS subscription. Click to learn more about billing.
billingLabels.appAuthenticationBillingLabel: Billing for app authentication. Usage billed to your ArcGIS subscription. Click to learn more about billing.
billingLabels.apiTokenBillingLabel: Billing for API key authentication. Usage billed to your ArcGIS subscription. Click to learn more about billing.

accessTokenPrivileges.userAuthenticationAccessTokenPrivileges: Defined by the signed-in user's account
accessTokenPrivileges.appAuthenticationAccessTokenPrivileges: Defined as a property of the credentials item
accessTokenPrivileges.apiTokenAccessTokenPrivileges: Defined as a property of the credentials item

accessTokenPrivilegesLabels.userAuthenticationAccessTokenPrivilegesL: Access token privileges for user authentication
accessTokenPrivilegesLabels.appAuthenticationAccessTokenPrivilegesLa: Access token privileges for app authentication
accessTokenPrivilegesLabels.apiTokenAccessTokenPrivilegesLabel: Access token privileges for API key authentication

accessTokenStorage.userAuthenticationAccessTokenStorage: Dynamically created when a user signs in
accessTokenStorage.appAuthenticationAccessTokenStorage: Dynamically created and stored server-side or in a standalone console script

accessTokenStorageLabels.userAuthenticationAccessTokenStorageLabe: Access token storage for user authentication
accessTokenStorageLabels.appAuthenticationAccessTokenStorageLabel: Access token storage for app authentication
accessTokenStorageLabels.apiTokenAccessTokenStorageLabel: Access token storage for API key authentication

accessTokenDuration.userAuthenticationAccessTokenDuration: Up to 2 weeks and can be refreshed
accessTokenDuration.apiTokenAccessTokenDuration: Up to one year and can be rotated

accessTokenDurationLabels.userAuthenticationAccessTokenDurationLab: Access token duration for user authentication
accessTokenDurationLabels.appAuthenticationAccessTokenDurationLabe: Access token duration for app authentication
accessTokenDurationLabels.apiTokenAccessTokenDurationLabel: Access token duration for API key authentication
